name: Pumpkin Picking Scramble
description:
Compete against the AI in this minute long scramble to collect the most pumpkins from the undead! Use the mouse to direct your skeleton to the glowing jack-o-lanterns! Take note of their color: you'll get different points based on what color they glow.

Controls:

WASD - move the camera around to view the level.

Mouse & Left Click - use the mouse to pick a spot for your character to go. Clicking on the ground will cause your character to move to that spot. Your character will automatically collect the pumpkin when they get close enough.

Assets used:

Skeleton Models - Simple Skeleton (Prizma)

Cauldrons, pumpkins, graves, ground - Free Cartoon Halloween Pack - Mobile/VR (Lumo-Art 3D)

Trees, rocks, graves, fences, skybox - Halloween Cemetery Set (3dfancy)

Music - HyperCasual Music Pack Demo (VOiD1 Gaming)

Sound Effects - 44.1 General Library (Free Sample Pack) (InspectorJ Sound Effects)
